sentences.en: I hunted a musket two years ago.
I hunted with a musket two years ago.
sentences.cn: 两年前我用滑膛枪打猎。

sentences.en: Mounted a camel this unit a powerful musket a " jezail '. "
sentences.cn: 火枪骆驼骑兵使用长管滑膛火枪,称为 “ 杰扎尔 ”,威力极为惊人.

sentences.en: So some seconds passed, till suddenly Joyce whipped up his musket and fired.
sentences.cn: 又过了几秒钟,突然, 乔伊斯端起枪来开了火.

sentences.en: Sudden and loud as the sound of a soldier grounding his musket.
sentences.cn: 突兀响亮,像士兵放下步枪枪托墩在地上.

sentences.en: Take not a musket to kill a butterfly.
The musket and cannon fire seemed so real, making history spring to life before my eyes.
sentences.cn: 子弹飞梭, 炮火冲天.犹如真实再现.生动的把历史展现在我眼前.

sentences.en: The term derived from his weapon , a short musket called the dragoon.
sentences.cn: 因其所使用的一种名为龙骑枪的短滑膛枪而得名.

sentences.en: This forerunner of the musket is capable of firing deadly volleys that can pierce armour.
sentences.cn: 这些火枪的先驱者可以射出穿透盔甲的致命齐射.

sentences.en: This right here is a musket used in the Civil War.
sentences.cn: 这把枪是南北战争时期的步枪.

sentences.en: While underneath, in a corner, were fowling piece, musket, and matchlock.
sentences.cn: 下面, 角落里, 堆着鸟枪, 步枪, 和火绳枪.

words.tran_cn: 步兵；火枪手；持步枪的士兵
步枪射击术；步兵部队；步枪
